description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Salmon With Blueberry Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ fish,Pescatarian,Quick & easy dinner,Blueberry,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Grilled Salmon With Blueberry Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200oC and line a baking tray with non-stick baking paper. Place salmon fillets on the tray and set aside.

Place oil in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 2 minutes or until translucent. Add blueberries and cook for 2 minutes or until starting to burst. Add vinegar, thyme and a pinch of salt and cook, stirring occasionally and squashing a few of the blueberries with the back of the spoon, for 3-4 minutes or until slightly reduced.
Spoon blueberry sauce over the salmon and bake for 10 minutes or until salmon is just cooked through.
Meanwhile, heat a small frying pan over high heat. Add the lemon halves, cut side down, and cook for 2 minutes or until slightly charred.
Divide the salmon and salad leaves between plates. Sprinkle over pepper and serve with the charred lemon halves.
